A third version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''December 23, 2009''' at 14:59 UTC, to make the game playable again.<ref name=":0">[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs] on Archive.org; #minecraft.20091223.log. == Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed an issue where players were having difficulty downloading the previous version due to an incorrect [[al_version]], causing the version client to not be refreshed.<ref name=":0"/>
